summary: Passengers on a European train have been exposed to a deadly disease. Nobody will let them off the train. So what happens next?
cast: Sophia Loren|Richard Harris|Martin Sheen|O.J. Simpson|Lionel Stander|Ann Turkel|Ingrid Thulin|Lee Strasberg|Ava Gardner|Burt Lancaster|Lou Castel|John Phillip Law|Ray Lovelock|Alida Valli|Stefano Patrizi|Thomas Hunter|Fausta Avelli|Angela Goodwin|Carlo De Mejo|John P. Dulaney|Andrea Esterhazy|Renzo Palmer|Teresa Rossi Passante|Michael Staudt|Adam Strasberg|David Lee Strasberg|Maurizio Streccioni|Thomas Williams
director: Director: George P. Cosmatos (as George Pan Cosmatos)
title: El puente de Casandra
